name: Buckler
description: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

abilities.name: Buckler Aura
abilities.description: Increases the armor of nearby player-controlled allies.
notes: Multiple instances of Buckler Aura do not stack
Fully stacks with other sources of Buckler-based items' armor aura

additionalInfo: With Buckler Aura, the item grants a total of 3 armor to the wielder
trivia: In DotA, this item is named Nathrezim Buckler, which is a reference to the Nathrezim, a race within the Warcraft universe
In Dota 2, the item's name was shortened to just Buckler, to avoid copyright issues with Blizzard Entertainment

recentChanges.description: Now grants 1 armor bonus. Increased Recipe cost from 200 to 250 (total cost increases from 375 to 425)
No longer builds into Mekansm. Now builds into Guardian Greaves and Vladmir's Offering

No longer builds into Vladmir's Offering. Now builds into Mekansm. Item cost changes: Increased Ring of Protection cost from 150 to 175, Reduced Recipe cost from 225 to 200. Total gold cost remains at 375
